meanings.definition: The process of making a printing plate by photographic methods.
meanings.sent1: The photoengraving was used to create detailed images for the magazine.
meanings.sent2: The artist used a photoengraving to transfer the design onto the metal plate.
meanings.sent3: The photoengraving process turned out to be a fun way to make art for the school project.
meanings.sent4: Her memory was like a photoengraving, capturing every detail of that special day.
meanings.sent5: The photoengraving technique brought the landscape to life on the page.
